pullrequest.title: pro-pose-al: Rename "affixed to" to "attached to". Define terms up front

content.raw: be **attached to** another frame *or link*. I realize a link is also a frame, but later on we say that implicit frames are introduced for convenience, which sounds like they are not necessary, but they are necessary to attach frames to links. Maybe I'm being pedantic.
content.html: be attached to another frame or link. I realize a link is also a frame, but later on we say that implicit frames are introduced for convenience, which sounds like they are not necessary, but they are necessary to attach frames to links. Maybe I'm being pedantic.
